snippet.title: Santa's Secret Valley (1995) [WINDOWS]
snippet.description:
I know it's not christmas time, but anyway...

From the official site:

Santas Secret Valley is a light-hearted graphical adventure with a Christmas theme. Can you rescue Santas magic items? Entertaining puzzles, a Christmas trivia quiz, delightful music and artwork make SSV a treat for just about anyone. Ideal for kids and grown-ups to work on together!

Santas Secret Valley is a graphical adventure game with a Christmas theme. Each puzzle you solve takes you further into the unfolding story, and one step closer to winning. If you get stuck, the built-in hint feature supplies just the right amount of help. Keep your wits about you, and dont give up — theres still time to save Christmas!
Beautifully illustrated! — Full-color renderings by Brigid Skelton
Educational! — Includes a Christmas quiz in the Secret Valley theater!
Non-violent! — No violence whatsoever
Stimulating! — We promise hours of absorbing play for ages 8-109

You can order the Santas Secret Valley CD, or choose electronic delivery for a few dollars less.
